races.name: Human
races.description: Humans are the most versatile of all races, adapting quickly to any situation. Their determination and ambition drive them to excel in all fields.

races.name: Elf
races.description: Elves are graceful beings with an innate connection to magic. Their long lifespans grant them wisdom and patience, though they lack the physical resilience of other races.

races.name: Dwarf
races.description: Dwarves are stout and hardy folk, renowned for their resilience and strength. They make excellent warriors and craftsmen, though they lack grace and social finesse.

races.name: Halfling
races.description: Halflings are small but nimble folk known for their luck and charm. Their quick reflexes and natural agility make them excellent scouts and rogues.

races.name: Orc
races.description: Orcs are powerful and fierce warriors, bred for battle. Their raw strength and toughness are unmatched, though they often lack subtlety and magical aptitude.
